wiki.content:
"One More Night" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 Chart in the Autumn of 2012 for 9 weeks. It was the longest running #1 song of 2012. It has sold 3.5 million digital copies in the U.S.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "One More Night" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 Chart in the Autumn of 2012 for 9 weeks. It was the longest running #1 song of 2012. It has sold 3.5 million digital copies in the U.S.
